title: Your First Save
storyIntro: Sprout the squirrel found a shiny acorn. Should they eat it now or save it for winter?

steps.content: You found 5 Sprout Points! What do you want to do?

choices.label: Put 3 in Save jar, 2 in Fun jar
choices.outcome: Great balance! You're learning to save and have fun.

choices.label: Put all in Fun jar
choices.outcome: Fun is important! Next time try putting a little in Save too.

choices.label: Put all in Save jar
choices.outcome: Super saver! Don't forget to enjoy a little fun sometimes.

title: Earning Your Points
storyIntro: Help at home and earn Sprout Points. Small tasks add up!

steps.content: You helped set the table. You earned 5 points! Where do they go?

choices.label: Save jar
choices.outcome: Nice! Saving helps you reach big goals.
